title: Day 6 Part 2
description: Confirmation entries, premium/discount zones, and equilibrium concepts in trading.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• What confirmation entry strategy means
• Retracement entries into premium zones
• Premium zone definition and placement
• Discount zone locations
• Equilibrium and its significance
• Risk management with confirmation entries

quiz.question: Confirmation entry improves:
quiz.explanation: Waiting for confirmation before entering reduces false signals and improves win rate.

quiz.question: A retracement entry aims to:
quiz.explanation: Retracement entries place you at better price levels (premium or discount zones) with better risk-reward.

quiz.question: Premium zone is typically:
quiz.explanation: Premium zones are above equilibrium, representing expensive price levels.

quiz.question: Discount zone is:
quiz.explanation: Discount zones are below equilibrium, representing cheaper price levels for better entries.

quiz.question: Equilibrium represents:
quiz.explanation: Equilibrium is typically the 50% level of a price range.
